name: ViroChem™ Disinfectant Spray
description: ViroChem™ Disinfectant Spray is an all-in-one multi-surface disinfectant, pending EPA registration and on the EPA N list of approved disinfectants proven to fight against emerging viral pathogens. Non-chlorine or quarternary formula, ViroChem™ is a registered trademark of Lubrco LLC, designed to provide effective cleaning, deodorizing and sanitizing in areas where deep cleaning is critical in controlling the hazards of cross-contamination on surfaces and transfer points for bacteria.
